snippet.title: Space Grunts 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the game here: https://www.orangepixel.net/spacegrunts2

Space Grunts 2 is a card-battle-roguelike with top-down and turn-based gameplay.  Collect cards and play them in battles against a variation of aliens, creatures and random happening/events.

Can you fix the problem on the alien space station?


#trailer #game #indiegame

Trailer Music "Burnt Spirit" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
__

I'm Pascal a Dutch independent game developer since 2004 known as Orangepixel. I talk about my games, my days and my experiences. Follow me?  I post a new video once a week.

MERCH:https://www.orangepixel.net/shop/
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/jYr6XVC
__
If you want exclusive sketches and behind the scenes info delivered to your mail box, sign-up here:
http://www.orangepixel.net/sign-up/

Or be a PATRON: http://patreon.com/orangepixel
__

COME SAY HI! on SOCIAL MEDIA:

✧ Twitter: https://twitter.com/orangepixel - game related
✧ Twitter: https://twitter.com/orangepascal - everything else
✧ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/orangepixel
✧ IG: http://instagram.com/orangepixelgames
✧ http://www.orangepixel.net
